text: George Martin (August 15, 1929 - June 1, 2010) was an American television, stage, and movie actor who is known for his role as the hotel receptionist in LÃ©on: The Professional. Martin was nominated for a Tony Award in 1983. He has also founded the Air-Edel Recording Studios in 1969. He was born on August 15, 1929 in New York City, New York. Martin died on June 1, 2010 in his home in Providence, Rhode Island, aged 80. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2010 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from New York City
title: George Martin (American actor)
